summary: Holly's world is turned upside down when her niece's wish to Santa Claus comes true and she cannot tell a lie. As her career and love life go into disarray, she must learn to judge between the truth and what is right.
cast: Alicia Witt|George Stults|Brigid Brannagh|Mia Bagley|Dan Lauria|Maxwell Caulfield|Eli Baldwin|Derrick Dean|Terance Goodman|Chiao-ih Hui|Malinda Money|Zack Phifer|Walter Platz|Ash Santos|Palmer Scott|Joseph Skousen|Anne Sward|Cathy Tidwell|Annette Wright|Spencer Barber|John Forker|Mike Hardy|John Lund|Joshua David McLerran|Michael McQuain|Marilyn Miller|Joseph Park
title: No estoy preparada para la Navidad
